item.title: 'Love Island USA' final week: Here are remaining couples, who went home
item.description: "Love Island USA" season seven is coming to a close,with just four more episodes left before the winning couple is revealed. After Sunday night's episode, fans voted for their favorite couple, and part of the results were revealed on Tuesday night.

item.title: Jacksonville’s Nic Advances to Love Island USA Season 7 Finale
item.description: With the 'Love Island USA' Season 7 finaleairing Sunday, July 13, Jacksonville native Nick Vansteenberghe has emerged as one of the season’s standout Islanders and a fan favorite to watch.

item.title: Who is leading the Scottish Open? First round scores and how to watch
item.description: The PGA Tour's best are overseas for the next two weeks, first with this unofficial warm-up to the prestigious British Open, theGenesis Scottish Open.

item.title: Score Dyson vacuums up to 33% off during Amazon Prime Day
item.description: Amazon Prime Dayis known for delivering some big discounts on must-have items. That might sound super vague, but it is true. Prime Day 2025 has deals on headphones, face cleansers, vacuums, and more.
